column5: Check this clip out. They say that the Janpanese Hornet's poison is extremely potent.  http://www.metacafe.com/watch/206326/10_gi...000_honey_bees/  http://www.nearlygood.com/video/beefight.html
That is just whacked man! I wouldn't want one of them to be chompin on me like that!! Deadly!  Rob C
Lets see them duke it out with the African killer bees.
YIKES!  Those are some bad dudes.
Reports have it that thier thick body armor is hard to penetrate. And other bee venom can't harm them.
